text:
e="preserve"> is a Japanese digital library. This online collection has several thousands of works of Japanese-language fiction and non-fiction.
"Aozora Bunko" has digital copies of many out-of-copyright books.
Project Gutenberg is similar to "Aozora Bunko".
History.
"Aozora Bunko" was established in 1997.
In 2006, "Aozora Bunko" became a public policy advocate for freely accessible e-books.
